title.text:
Height of Plants in Garden
A group of gardeners recorded the height of their plants.
Draw a line plot and answer the questions below.

1. How many plants were there?
2. What was the tallest plant height?
3. How many plants were shorter than 30 inches?
4. What was the most common plant height?
5. How many more plants were 25 inches than 40 inches?
6. How many plants were taller than 25 inches?

Courtesy of JonAyves Learning Club
YouTube: @JonAyvesTV | Instagram: @AJsHouseKids
